name: Pool Ace - 8 Ball, 9 Ball Game
description:
Pool Ace was built for true billiard enthusiasts. Its realistic physics simulation brings the thrill and excitement of the pool hall to life! Your quest for the perfect pool game will end with Pool Ace! It's designed to keep you taking shot after shot! Don't miss it out and download now to play free!

● Game Features:
[Free to play! Free chips every day]
- Free to play! Login every day for free chips, treasure chests, cues, and other rewards!

[Ultra-Realistic! World-Class Physics Simulation!]
- The latest in physics engines delivers the world's best physics simulation and most authentic 8-ball shots!

[Tense and Exciting! Real-time multiplayer battles!]
- Bring your skill to battles set in famous sites around the world! Break into the game and challenge the best of the best!

[Will you rise to the challenge and position yourself as a master?]
- The Master's Challenge comprises special trick shots that mimic real-world experiences.

[Endless Fun! Relaxing challenge mode for the whole family!]
- You’ll find special trick shot challenges in a variety of stages. Play without pressure and claim rewards stage by stage!

[Variety galore! Personalized items catering to your style.]
- Over 10,000 specially designed cues, tables, and emoticons for you to build your perfect setup. In fact, build your own pool hall!

[Fight for national prestige! Global multiplayer rankings every week!]
- The global multiplayer rankings renew every week for an additional challenge and bragging rights. Join now and save the next top shot for you and your homeland!

[Connect to your social network! Play with family and friends.]
- Pool Ace supports logging in via multiple social networks. Log in with your favorite account and hang out with all your friends!

● Share your feedback at the Pool Ace fan page!
- https://www.facebook.com/PoolAceII
